entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High 6 with temperature falling to zero this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this afternoon then cloudy. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 40 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High 6 with temperature falling to zero this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
